channel.title: [AMAZING BASE!] Ventrix Base and client release [RELEASED!]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EhCoa.png[/img] [size=24pt][u][b]IF YOU DOWNLOADED THIS PLEASE SCAN YOUR COMPUTER[/b][/u][/size]
About Ventrix This server has been in development for a long time, and hosted for a bit and we are now releasing this base to the public, for the good of the community!
What Ventrix has for players to experience There is alot of content that players who join will enjoy such as; -Over 15 exclusive quests to embark on -Many minigames to play -A heap of cities to visit -24 individual skills to train -Dungeons to encounter -Never before seen monsters to encounter -High stability -Low lagg -Combat to near perfection -Economy in progression -New places to explore -Over 2800 obtainable items -Complete treasure trail system (including Uri emotes) -A whole new travelling system to use -[B]Much more![/B]
[CENTER][IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/xgEVnn.png[/img] Follow your clue scrolls and end your Treasure Trail!
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/nNVhkn.png[/img] Solve puzzling puzzles...XD!
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/frWZPC.png[/img] Cast mighty spells from three different spellbooks!
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/9xLeoV.png[/img] Receive new items from slaying beasts!
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/ad4mKr.png[/img] Get around using enchanted jewellery!
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/WWQlU5.png[/img] Summon upon your trusty familiar!
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/YbEEZJ.png[/img] Explore mighty dungeons and defeat powerful beasts!
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/Op9Rgq.png[/img] Forage for tribes all around Ventrix!
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/5bxldf.png[/img] Take part in the Godwars!
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/108flt4.jpg[/img] Obtain items you've never see before!
[IMG]http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_RmTdib9SruM/TTEyh_N6BDI/AAAAAAAAABg/gjs8TEsNSHs/s1600/runecrafting.PNG[/img] Train up to 24 exclusive skills!
[IMG]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-hvUAkzW8y1Y/TYWHTsvW27I/AAAAAAAAACE/7kwXwolOaeQ/s320/goblinvill.PNG[/img] Embark on many quests!
[IMG]http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_RmTdib9SruM/TTEyaBthe7I/AAAAAAAAAAw/IMZ9AYEV8f8/s1600/toktz-ket-dill.PNG[/img] Kill mighty bosses!
So what are you waiting for? Download ventrix today!
Media http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Trhh7JD2aQ [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uJrzrAi8M5k]Ventrix Boss: TokTz-Ket-Dill - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W7MLglLewxA]Ventrix Boss: Corporeal Beast - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3JH0Ar3IFXg&lc=tV1EH86KKlTqUCgevcnuj2O6KXOg8ymkO4TbaaIEmWs&feature=inbox]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3JH0Ar3IFXg&lc=tV1EH86KKlTqUCgevcnuj2O6KXOg8ymkO4TbaaIEmWs&feature=inbox[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AiYb30X5OOU]Ventrix Quest: 'The Monk's Sin; Rise of the Adamantite Dragon' - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bkw6Wrwj1to]Ventrix Quest: "Zurok's Legend" - YouTube[/url] [/CENTER]

item.title: [AMAZING BASE!] Ventrix Base and client release [RELEASED!]
item.dc:creator: @oiSquare oiSquare
item.description:
@oiSquare wrote:

[CENTER]

EhCoa.png800×130

[size=24pt]IF YOU DOWNLOADED THIS PLEASE SCAN YOUR COMPUTER[/size]

About Ventrix
This server has been in development for a long time, and hosted for a bit and we are now releasing this base to the public, for the good of the community!

What Ventrix has for players to experience
There is alot of content that players who join will enjoy such as;
-Over 15 exclusive quests to embark on
-Many minigames to play
-A heap of cities to visit
-24 individual skills to train
-Dungeons to encounter
-Never before seen monsters to encounter
-High stability
-Low lagg
-Combat to near perfection
-Economy in progression
-New places to explore
-Over 2800 obtainable items
-Complete treasure trail system (including Uri emotes)
-A whole new travelling system to use
-Much more!

[CENTER]
Follow your clue scrolls and end your Treasure Trail!


Solve puzzling puzzles…XD!


Cast mighty spells from three different spellbooks!


Receive new items from slaying beasts!


Get around using enchanted jewellery!


Summon upon your trusty familiar!


Explore mighty dungeons and defeat powerful beasts!


Forage for tribes all around Ventrix!


Take part in the Godwars!


Obtain items you’ve never see before!


Train up to 24 exclusive skills!


Embark on many quests!


Kill mighty bosses!

So what are you waiting for? Download ventrix today!

Media


Ventrix Boss: TokTz-Ket-Dill - YouTube
Ventrix Boss: Corporeal Beast - YouTube
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3JH0Ar3IFXg&lc=tV1EH86KKlTqUCgevcnuj2O6KXOg8ymkO4TbaaIEmWs&feature=inbox
Ventrix Quest: ‘The Monk’s Sin; Rise of the Adamantite Dragon’ - YouTube
Ventrix Quest: “Zurok’s Legend” - YouTube
[/CENTER]

Read full topic
